scripts.install-deps: mix deps.get && npm i && cd priv/react_app && npm i && cd ../..
scripts.test-backend: npm run startS3 && MIX_ENV=test mix do compile, test --trace && npm run stopS3
scripts.test-frontend: cd priv/react_app && npm run test && cd ../..
scripts.test: npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
scripts.test-coverage-frontend: cd priv/react_app && npm run test-coverage; cd ../..
scripts.download-prod-db: MIX_ENV=dev mix ecto.drop && heroku pg:pull -a arkad-nexpo DATABASE_URL nexpo_dev
